name: PARSE ALLY
description: The ancient system, without waiting for help, was destroyed. You are next. Yes? You and the survivors, grouped to repel the onslaught of the intruders. Of course, not all people will support you: there are those who are more interested in continuing the existing conflicts.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: i7-7500U Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: MX150 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: ASUS Xonar DSX
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
